q: Filling in for Rush on Monday, guest-host Mark Steyn took the news of Eminem's Detroit-is-back Super Bowl ad and Chrysler-Fiat CEO Sergio Marchionne 's`` shyster loan'' comment and went to town on Detroit. Unlike European cities, no bombs fell on this American city, this American city did it to themselves, he said, taking offense at the ad's protrayal of Detroit as a comeback city. He also zeroed in on Chrysler for taking corporate welfare then spending$ 9 million of it on a Super Bowl ad.
